headline: Kenvue Deal With Kimberly-Clark Puts Valuation And Dividend In Focus
summary: Shareholders of Kenvue (NYSE:KVUE) have approved the company’s acquisition by Kimberly-Clark, with the deal now awaiting regulatory and closing conditions. Kimberly-Clark shareholders have also voted in favor of the transaction, aligning both sides on the proposed takeover structure. Kenvue has announced that Chief Financial Officer Amit Banati plans to depart following the completion of the acquisition, setting up a key leadership transition. Kenvue enters this phase of corporate change...

headline: Is It Time To Revisit Kimberly Clark (KMB) After Its 1 Year Share Price Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether Kimberly-Clark is attractively priced right now, this article will walk through how its current share price stacks up against several valuation checks. The stock recently closed at US$109.90, with returns of 2.1% over 7 days, 10.7% over 30 days, 8.4% year to date, but a 17.1% decline over 1 year and 4.2% over 3 years, and a 0.9% gain over 5 years. Recent coverage around Kimberly-Clark has focused on its position as a major consumer staples brand and how that role...
